measurements.description: One large flower on one 14-cm staked inflorescence; dorsal sepal recurved, downy, white, veined purple, distal strong reticulations purple; synsepal white, veined purple; petals down-swept, recurved, white, veined purple, overlaid green proximally, superior margins edged purple, hirsute, margins undulate; pouch pale chartreuse, veined light mahogany, darker mahogany vein centrally, heavily speckled purple internally; staminode chartreuse, stippled purple, superior half reticulated green; substance firm; texture velvet, pouch glossy.
